articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Indian men's, women's teams bag bronze in roller skating - Rediff.com
articles.description: India's roller skaters clinched two bronze medals in men's and women's 3000m team relay events at the Asian Games on Monday.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Sanjana Bathula, Karthika Jagadeeswaran, Heeral Sadhu and Aarathy Kasturi Raj celebrate winning bronze at the Asian Games on Monday. Photograph: SAI Media/X

articles.author: Rahul Sadhu
articles.title: Asian Games: Aditi Ashok – ‘Being the first woman golfer to win a medal for India is a special feeling’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Having set herself for a grand finish, Aditi Ashok struggles on last day and settles for silver, Thailand's Arpichaya Yubol takes gold
articles.content: At 18 years and four months, India’s Aditi Ashok was the youngest golfer at the 2016 Rio Olympics. Seven years later on Sunday, she won the silver medal in the Asian Games in Hangzhou.For the 25-year… [+6397 chars]
